title: Segregated Funds
description: Client funds are completely segregated from company capital and securely held in independent accounts with top-tier banking institutions.

title: Global Regulation
description: SecureFx Capital Ltd is regulated by the Labuan Financial Services Authority (Labuan FSA), ensuring transparency, compliance, and operational integrity.

title: Professional Insurance Cover
description: Every SecureFx account is protected by professional indemnity insurance, providing coverage of up to USD 1,000,000 per account.

title: Civil Liability Policy
description: An additional layer of protection through a â‚¬2,500,000 civil liability insurance policy safeguards clients against negligence or third-party risks.

title: Negative Balance Protection
description: Traders are protected from account overdrafts, ensuring you never lose more than the funds you have deposited.

title: Trusted Banking Partnerships
description: Client deposits are securely held with Barclays Bank PLC, a British global bank operating in over 50 countries worldwide.
